message.body: Hi there it's Remi with 24Seven! Just checking in to see if you need anything for H2O today? Let me know, thanks!
Hi Remi I am here a cargo and pure minerals is having an event also but there's no one here representing them so I guess I'm awesome thank you
Haha you are awesome :) let me know if you need anything. Thanks!
Rimi,would like to send my survey so I can get paid I was wondering about the hour training should I put in with store?thanx
We will add the training since there wasn't a quiz!
